Package org.cesecore.keys.util

Interface ISignOperation

  • public interface ISignOperation
    An object of a class implementing this interface must be constructed before using SignWithWorkingAlgorithm.
    Version:
    $Id: ISignOperation.java 22408 2015-12-08 20:19:48Z primelars $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void taskWithSigning​(String signAlgorithm, Provider provider)
      This method must implement implement a task that is signing something.

    • Method Detail

      • taskWithSigning

        void taskWithSigning​(String signAlgorithm,
                     Provider provider)
              throws TaskWithSigningException
        This method must implement implement a task that is signing something. It is used when there is no requirement on which signing algorithm to use. The algorithm is chosen from a list of algorithms. The first time the method is called we have to find an algorithm that is working for the used provider (HSM). This is achieved by trying algorithms in the list until a working one is found. After this method has been successfully called succeeding calls will use the algorithm that worked. Call SignWithWorkingAlgorithm.doSignTask(List, Provider, ISignOperation) when taskWithSigning(String, Provider) should be executed.
        Parameters:
        signAlgorithm - algorithm
        provider - provider
        Throws:
        TaskWithSigningException - thrown if the signing can not be done.
